property.name: fs.defaultFS
property.description: GS (Rob) - This should reference the logical cluster name (for HA).

property.name: hadoop.http.authentication.type
property.description: EB Defines authentication used for Oozie HTTP endpoint. Supported values are: simple / kerberos / #AUTHENTICATION_HANDLER_CLASSNAME#

property.name: hadoop.rpc.protection
property.description: EB This field sets the quality of protection for secured sasl connections. Possible values are authentication, integrity and privacy. authentication means authentication only and no integrity or privacy; integrity implies authentication and integrity are enabled; and privacy implies all of authentication, integrity and privacy are enabled."

property.name: hadoop.security.authentication
property.description: EB Possible values are simple (no authentication), and kerberos
